title: 【急！】chestcommands插件
author: sfter
txt_content:
我设置了
name: '&b&l最之巅快捷指令栏&dV1.0'
  rows: 6
  open-sound: NOTE_PLING
  open-with-item:
  item-id: 345
  left-click: true
  right-click: true
  data-value: 0

这个样，用指南针打开一个界面，可是不行
求大神看看，修改一下

replies.author: BearJW
replies.txt_content:
name上面还要加个menu-settings:       要顶格
比如：
menu-settings:
  name: '&3&l快捷菜单' 
  rows: 4
  open-with-item:
    id: compass
    left-click: false
    right-click: true
